title: Japan server
body:
I live in Dalian, China and I try to play on the Japan server. I can login just fine and everything but when I go into a game and after champ select the actual game never seems to load, I always get a loss of connection during the champ loading screen which makes no sense considering my youtube etc work fine. 

Please help, I miss playing league

replies.body:
Even though you're able to pull up youtube without any problems, your network is still probably having a hard time getting a good signal from the JP servers when you're in a different geographical location. Basically, your connection has to travel a lot further to reach those JP servers than someone who lives in that region, so you're most likely going to have a higher ping and slower loading times. 

We can try to smooth out those loading times, but there's still going to be a slight delay since the servers are so far away from you. Let's check up on your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for anything we could adjust, test it in a custom game, and let me know how it goes.
Problem is I am originally from NZ and was playing on OCE servers absolutely perfectly which is a far shorter distance than Dalian to Japan. Also my play button often goes dark.
